Reviews.Title: Nice "Starter Camera"
Reviews.Author: Dragoslav T. Marcovich
Reviews.Content: My 12 year old grand daughter loves it; she can 'pocket' the camera for school field trips and she loves the "camera to Facebook" interface.

Reviews.Title: Ok
Reviews.Author: Candi
Reviews.Content: Ok for a simple easy to use camera.  Would only get it for a kid that wants to start out.  Just not what I was wanting but is a good camera.

Reviews.Title: Great Point & Shoot Camera.
Reviews.Author: H. Kamdar "Sleek"
Reviews.Content: I have used Fuji Products since My childhood (Films) Once Digital Era started This is 2 Digital Point & Shoot Fuji Camera for My Wife who cannot handle Complicated Cameras (Pro Cameras) and she is so Happy with this camera.This little Gem is 14 MP Has lots of presets can take 720 P HD Movies and can handle large capacity SD Cards and has 5X optical Zoom with capacity of taking Panoramic Images.

Reviews.Title: Takes beautiful pictures but ....
Reviews.Author: Peggy T. "Pegs Quest"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera mainly due to the overall size of both the camera and screen.  It easily fits into a pocket for quick access and convenience  rather than rifling through a purse or bag.  I set it on 'Auto' and every picture adjusted itself to the situation.  I am impressed with the overall performance, however, the only (somewhat) minor drawback is the fact that it seems to use up the AA batteries rather quickly.  I will purchase a better quality battery, one recommended for digital camera use, in the near future to see if that reduces the need to carry extra batteries with me.  Otherwise, I highly recommend purchasing this camera and would purchase the same exact camera again if I needed another one.

Reviews.Title: Couple Problems
Reviews.Author: Pracilla_bear
Reviews.Content: The pictures taken are GREAT and it's nice for younger beginners but the video is awful. It cannot be paused and the volume isn't the best. The bottom bar that holds the batteries on mine is BREAKING OFF and my buttons curved in. The zoom is great, the display is great, so I recommend it to younger children if they want to know what it is like to take pictures (flash is extraordinary), but the engineering and video is a great loss for such a potential product. But honestly I want to throw mine away, it's damaging itself ):

Reviews.Title: A $78 wonder
Reviews.Author: Ron Gacek
Reviews.Content: This Fuji only cost me $78 and am 100% satisfied with the quality of videos and photos it takes.  All my cameras have been Fuji, and continue to stick with the brand, because never had a problem with Fuji

Reviews.Title: Didn't mention it was "refurbished"
Reviews.Author: Leah J. Segal
Reviews.Content: I thought I was buying a new camera - the description didn't mention it was "refurbished"  The box looks all messed up, I'm embrassed to give it as a gift.
